description: Ms. codex. Title from leaf 1b. Physical description: 15-21 lines per page; written in naskh in black by different hands on glazed, laid European paper. Catchwords. Several leaves are detached. Mild staining. Origin: Jumādá II 1254 H [October-September 1838] (leaf 98b). Incipit: الحمد لله الذي صغرت في عظمته عبادة العابدين
author: Muḥaqqiq al-Ḥillī, Jaʻfar ibn al-Ḥasan, 1205 or 1206-1277
abstract: Abridgement of the author's Sharāʼiʻ al-Islām.
extent: 99 leaves : paper ; 210 x 146 (150-160 x 92-104) mm bound to 210 x 152 mm
title: Hādhā Kitāb Mukhtaṣar al-nāfiʻ.
creator: محقق الحلي، جعفر بن الحسن، 1205 or 1206-1277
subject: Islamic law—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
